tech_news.title: Google Launches Unauthorized Pixel-to-iPhone File Sharing With Apple’s AirDrop - Bloomberg.com
tech_news.description: Alphabet Inc.’s Google said it has developed a way for its latest Pixel smartphones to exchange images and other files with iPhones using Apple Inc.’s AirDrop protocol, a bold attempt to undermine the exclusivity of its rival’s closely guarded ecosystem.
